response.original_title: BABYMETAL - Live RISING SUN ROCK FESTIVAL 2023 in EZO
response.overview: BABYMETAL's performance at the RISING SUN ROCK FESTIVAL 2023 in EZO was a triumphant display of their ever-evolving musical prowess and stagecraft. Held in the scenic outdoors of Hokkaido, Japan, this festival appearance saw the band energize a massive crowd with their dynamic blend of J-pop and heavy metal. Su-metal and Moametal, along with their impeccable Kami Band, performed a mix of beloved classics and newer material, demonstrating their ability to engage and captivate fans new and old. Their show was a highlight of the festival, noted for its high-octane energy, precise choreography, and the magnetic charisma of its leads, cementing BABYMETAL's status as a powerhouse live act in the international music scene.
response.title: BABYMETAL - Live RISING SUN ROCK FESTIVAL 2023 in EZO
